abstract: Twitter introduces analytics and Facebook introduces hashtags. Old Spock battles the new Spock (in a well-received new commercial). Do you think the cloud is more secure than your own environment?
snippet: Twitter introduces analytics and Facebook introduces hashtags. Old Spock battles the new Spock (in a well-received new commercial). Do you think the cloud is more secure than your own environment?
lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners this week.

headline.main: This Week in Small Business: Analytics and Hashtags
